title: RBI Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Manager & Asst Manager Posts
text: RBI Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Manager & Asst Manager Posts RBI Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Manager & Asst Manager Posts: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has published notification for the recruitment of Manager (Technical – Civil) in Grade B, Assistant Manager (Rajbhasha) in Grade A and Assistant Manager (Security) in Grade A vacancies. Eligible candidates may apply online from 01-03-2017 to 16-03-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below…. RBI Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 19 Name of the Post: 1. Manager (Technical – Civil) in Grade B: 02 Posts 2. Assistant Manager (Rajbhasha) in Grade A: 10 Posts 3. Assistant Manager (Security) in Grade A: 07 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be 21 – 35 years (candidates must have been born not earlier than 02-03-1982 and not later than 01-03-1996) for Post No. 01, between 21 – 30 years (candidates must have been born not earlier than 02-03-1987 and not later than 01-03-1996) for Post No. 02 and 21 – 40 years (candidate must have been born not earlier than 02-03-1977 and not later than 01-03-1992 (both days inclusive)) as on 01-03-2017. Age relaxation is applicable to 05 years for SC/ ST candidates & 03 years for OBC candidates for Post No. 01 & 02. For more relaxation details refer the notification. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Bachelor’s Degree in Civil Engineering or equivalent qualification with a minimum of 60% marks or equivalent grade in aggregate of all semesters/years for Post No. 01, Second Class Master’s Degree in Hindi/ Hindi Translation with English as Core/ Elective/ Major subject at the Bachelor’s Degree level or Second Class Master’s Degree in English with Hindi as Core/ Elective/ Major subject at the Bachelor’s Degree level or Second Class Master’s Degree in Sanskrit/ Economics/ Commerce with English and Hindi as Core/ Elective/ Major subject at the Bachelor’s Degree level (In lieu of a subject of Hindi at Bachelor’s Degree level, one may have recognized Hindi qualification equivalent to a Bachelor’s Degree) or Master’s Degree in both English and Hindi/ Hindi Translation, of which one must be Second Class for Post No. 02 with relevant experience. For more qualification details refer the notification. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on written examination & interview. Application Fee : Candidates should pay Rs. 100/- (Intimation Charges only) for SC/ ST/ PWD candidates and Rs. 600/- for General/ OBC candidates (Application fee including Intimation Charges) through online by using Debit Cards (RuPay/ Visa/ MasterCard/ Maestro), Credit Cards, Internet Banking, IMPS, Cash Cards/ Mobile Wallet. How to Apply : Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.rbi.org.in from 01-03-2017 to 16-03-2017 for Post No. 01 to 03 & send their hard copy of the online application with photocopies of date of birth certificate, educational qualification certificate, mark sheets, caste certificate and Six copies of the duly filled Bio-data form (recent passport size Photograph of candidate, in original, may be pasted) in an envelope should be super scribed with “Application for the Post of Assistant Manager (Security) in Grade A” by post/courier to the General Manager, Reserve Bank of India Services Board, Third Floor, RBI Building, Opp. Mumbai Central Railway Station, Byculla, Mumbai – 400 008 on or before 22-03-2017 by 05:00 PM for Post No. 03. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying online candidates should have valid e mail id & passward 2. Candidates log on the website www.rbi.org.in 3. Click on “Opportunities@RBI —–> Current Vacancies ———> Vacancies. 4. Select the desired post & Read all the noitification 5. Again click on Appication (Apps) 4. Read all instructions login your self & fill all the details 5. Check once before submit the form 6. Now take a print out of online application for future use. Important Dates: Starting Date to Apply Online & Payment of Fee 01-03-2017 Last Date to Apply Online & Payment of Fee 16-03-2017 Closing Date for Editing Application Details 16-03-2017 Last Date for Printing Your Application 22-03-2017 Last Date for Receipt of Hard Copy of the Online Application 22-03-2017 by 05:00 PM For more details like salary, experience, reservation & other information click on the link given below….
